translationtableentry.text: Everything that we have taught you and the missions that have been assigned to you have been recorded.\n\nYou can review this information by pressing the "Notes" button in the lower part of the screen, or by pressing 'F8', as long as you are not in the middle of a conversation.

translationtableentry.text:
Hold the mouse pointer over any icon or text in the game menus to make a brief description of its utility appear.

In addition, if at any moment during the game you need more information about certain aspects, elements or units in the game, you can right-click the icons or texts to get further help about them.

Plus, it's always useful to read the manual.
